actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-226.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution providing for the continuation of the appointment of a special counsel to represent the House and the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce in certain judicial proceedings.

summary.text: Authorizes the chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to continue to intervene and appear in the pending action against American Telephone and Telegraph Company, civil action 76-1372, United States District Court for the District of Columbia, and to employ special counsel to continue to represent the Committee and the House in all judicial proceedings relating to such action.

titles.title: Resolution providing for the continuation of the appointment of a special counsel to represent the House and the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce in certain judicial proceedings.
